result.arabic_text: فَٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَلَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
result.translation: 29.Toysa isin jahannam girah afoofik cula teetil waarak keenik iyyan, tokkel jahannam gira is manxu gaca dabqii kee madabaay iimaan kee Yallih qibaadak kaxxamariinite marah.
